data.title: Huluâ€™s Hellraiser reboot gets a release date, Pinhead tease in first teaser
data.meta_description: Clive Barkerâ€™s Hellraiser returns this October with a reboot of the 1987 horror movie that launched a 10-movie franchise. Hulu will stream Hellraiser (2022) starting Oct. 7.
data.text:
Hulu just successfully revitalized the Predator franchise with Prey, and next, the streamer will attempt to pull off a similar reimagining of Clive Barkerâ€™s 1987 cult hit horror film Hellraiser, ahead of this Halloween.

Unlike original Hellraiser villain Pinhead, the first teaser for the new movie doesnâ€™t have such sights to show you. Thereâ€™s a grainy, blood-tinged look at the new Hell Priest, better known as Pinhead. Thereâ€™s a title treatment, an R rating, and a release date. Thatâ€™s it. But for Hellraiser franchise fans who enjoyed the first film, tolerated the second, and suffered through eight more sequels, thereâ€™s a thrill in the prospect of a new take on Barkerâ€™s tale of sadomasochistic other-dimensional beings, known as Cenobites, inflicting torment on the unwitting.

The new Hellraiser is directed by David Bruckner, who previously helmed The Night House, Siren, and The Ritual. His frequent collaborators Ben Collins and Luke Piotrowski wrote the script, with a story by David S. Goyer. Pinhead will be played by actor Jamie Clayton (Sense8, The L Word: Generation Q). She takes over for Doug Bradley, who played the iconic role in eight Hellraiser films, and Stephan Smith Collins and Paul T. Taylor, who starred as Pinhead in Hellraiser: Revelations and Hellraiser: Judgment.

Hellraiser will focus on a young woman, played by Odessa Aâ€™zion, who is struggling with addiction. According to 20th Century Studiosâ€™ plot description, she comes into possession of the seriesâ€™ signature puzzle box, unaware that its purpose is to summon the Cenobites.

The original Hellraiser was based on Barkerâ€™s novella The Hellbound Heart, and was directed by the author himself. The original story and Barkerâ€™s film adaptation focus on Frank Cotton, a sadomasochist who escapes from the Cenobitesâ€™ hellish realm and tasks his former lover with restoring Frankâ€™s shredded body, using the flesh and blood of murder victims. When Frankâ€™s niece Kirsty accidentally summons Pinhead and pals to Earth, the Cenobite leader is informed of her uncleâ€™s escape and makes an arrangement with her to recover his wayward prisoner.

The new Hellraiser reboot will arrive as a Hulu exclusive on Oct. 7.
